name: Wissdom
overview:
Wissdom is a social platform where people with the same or similar issues meet to communicate and share their experiences anonymously.

What’s Wissdom?

Wissdom is a social platform where people with the same or similar issues meet to share their experiences and help one another out anonymously. You can post your stories, suggestions and questions regarding any issue you want. People dealing with the same issues can share their experiences and “wisdom” while the site keeps them updated as related posts keep coming. Whateverâ€™s on your mind, youâ€™ll find youâ€™re not alone!

What’s special?

Wissdom is the only social platform dedicated to helping others by allowing people to share their experiences and receive the wisdom of others easily. Its launch is already snowballing into narrower issues concerning relationships, unemployment, loneliness, weight problems, cancer, smoking, diabetes, hair loss, and many other topics.

Social Proximity:

We know that an issue means different things to everyone else. A 60 years man and an 18 years old girl would feel different things about their weight problems. Thatâ€™s why we take social proximity into account and provide most relevant information to our users.
